reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable underwear I’ve ever worn!
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the hunt for underwear that fits my curves, has full coverage, is soft, doesn’t pinch, and stays put. THESE are exactly that!Pros:-Actually high-waisted.-Soft and breathable, perfect for sensitive skin.-Well-made. They wash perfectly fine, no worries there.-It doesn’t even feel like you’re wearing them, you don’t feel the elastic.-No squeezing. They fit where they should and stay put, standing, sitting, squats, all good!-They aren’t bulky, so the edges don’t stick out through skirts or dresses.I love these so much, and highly recommend getting some for yourself. Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great! I hate most underwear and these had me surprised. Nice fit, cozy, soft and flexible. Nice design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: 📌I had these underwear in my wish list for almost 5 months I don’t know why I just didn’t purchase them from the start. I literally tried all sorts of different brands and even different sizes of the same underwear just to find the fit I was searching for. So it seems I have found them, tucked away in my wish list for months, I guess it’s because of the cost? But honestly it’s about 3-4$ more than some brands on Amazon but definitely worth it. Other brands that were around 22$ or so just didn’t fit me in the legs and the stomach it was either or. This brand fits great. I did actually purchase a size XL at first but those were too large, so I sized down to the LARGE and I am so happy with the fit. My sister was so impressed with how these POKARLA undies looked when I pulled them out of the packaging, she ordered herself some. New packaging and arrived one day early as well! Ok here’s my stats just so you know because let me tell you how many reviews I had to read and it seemed like no other shoppers except a handful actually listed what size they wear and what size to order. I just want to help someone out there who needs it. So I am 5’4” and I weigh around 205, I carry all my weight in my stomach area and I’m more of a athletic body type, yeah I could stand to loose a few but shoot it’s called life happens and i am a work in progress. Hence; the high waist underwear works for me, I really didn’t know these existed like this, I used to love hipsters but all the ones I used to purchase from the box stores all were cheap and never held up plus they really cost a lot more than they used to, I was over those brands and even moved to discount bins at higher end department stores, ugh no luck. So this brand is great. Well made I did see some stitching I am sort of worried about so into the wash they went and I will update my review in a few weeks to see if these hold up like I hope they would! Love the colors and that the waist band is different colored than the rest of the underwear and also the stitching that stands out in the front part, really cute! They are definitely comfortable I will say that and no roll down issues either yes there is a panty line, but I can work with that. I will be updating in a few weeks like I said. I definitely recommend this purchase ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Hope I’ve helped somebody out! Be safe out there 💯😷😷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There was really nothing bad to say about these under garments. Very impressed with how they were put together. They fit me very well and I am a full figured woman. They are very comfortable and do not bind or cut into my legs. And they also last. Very satisfied. Please don't change a thing! Will definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not period panties
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered these I didn't pay close enough to attention. These are not period panties.... just regular panties. They are fantastic underware. I was wanting period panties. But would definitely recommend these. They fit well and are very soft and comfy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality & super comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This underwear is extremely comfortable. I love the material - it is not flimsy, it has adequate stretch, it fares well in washer & dryer, the size chart is accurate, the colors are as described...WOW! QUALITY IN 2024!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for style and material that they advertised. Was not disappointed. Quality was great. Ordered a medium as I usually wear. I am 5’7 plus and weight 140, not pear shape. Fits well around the legs and coverage on abdomen is comfortable. Washes great. When ordering again I might try a large to see the difference of comfort. Otherwise a 5 star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love them 100%.
reviews.reviewText: I love these they are soft, comfortable, durable, and come in many colors. I bought more in fear they will discontinue them. So I'm stocked with at least 10 to 15 for the future use. Try them they are worth it. Fit perfectly. I lost weight and they still are perfect.
Buena calidad y color, el corte me agradó mucho pues es bastante cómodo. Lo que más me gustó fue la tela, ya que es muy suave al tacto y se siente fresca. Volveré a comprar sin duda.

I just love these! I searched a lot of brands and styles, and read a lot of reviews before settling on these gems! I wanted some cotton underwear with stretch for comfort and was not disappointed. I'm a big bottomed girl, large around the butt and thighs, a true 'pear shape'. I ordered these a size up 'just in case' they didn't fit true to size. I could have ordered a size down (I'm usually a 3X, purchased the 4X) because these do have enough stretch in them but I am more than satisfied with the fit of the larger size...These panties are comfortable, the high waist stays where it is supposed to, it doesn't roll down. They don't bunch up, the fit is smooth and while the stretch is there, they also hold you in a bit, a bonus for me. The cotton fabric is thick enough to absorb any perspiration on hot summer days and will probably be warm for cooler days as the season progresses to cooler months. The fabric is soft, the gusset in the crotch has only one seam but that doesn't matter as far as fit goes. The seam is more in the center than one front and one back and I like that better as to me it's more comfortable. All in all I am more than pleased with these and will certainly order again. I wanted a change of pace from my usual brand (Just My Size, Fruit of the Loom) and am happy I chose these. If you buy them, you'll love them.
The product is great it covers your whole butt and gives a good shape to your body.
Material was good.. but I ordered XL and size didn’t even looked like XL.. It was more like M.If you’re ordering this product I prefer you to order Larger than your Actual Size.
